					<item>
		<title>Terms and Conditions</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/terms-and-conditions</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 20 Jun 2020 11:25:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?page_id=87</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Welcome to motorcyclehype.com!</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Motorcycle Hype's Website, located at https://motorcyclehype.com/.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use motorcyclehype.com if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. Our Terms and Conditions were created with the help of the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.termsandconditionsgenerator.com/">Terms And Conditions Generator</a>&nbsp;and the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/terms-conditions-generator/">Free Terms &amp; Conditions Generator</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Cookies</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We employ the use of cookies. By accessing motorcyclehype.com, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the Motorcycle Hype's Privacy Policy.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user’s details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>License</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Unless otherwise stated, Motorcycle Hype and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on motorcyclehype.com. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from motorcyclehype.com for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You must not:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Republish material from motorcyclehype.com</li><li>Sell, rent or sub-license material from motorcyclehype.com</li><li>Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from motorcyclehype.com</li><li>Redistribute content from motorcyclehype.com</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Motorcycle Hype does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Motorcycle Hype,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Motorcycle Hype shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Motorcycle Hype reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You warrant and represent that:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;</li><li>The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party;</li><li>The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy</li><li>The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You hereby grant Motorcycle Hype a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Hyperlinking to our Content</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Government agencies;</li><li>Search engines;</li><li>News organizations;</li><li>Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and</li><li>System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;</li><li>dot.com community sites;</li><li>associations or other groups representing charities;</li><li>online directory distributors;</li><li>internet portals;</li><li>accounting, law and consulting firms; and</li><li>educational institutions and trade associations.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Motorcycle Hype; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to Motorcycle Hype. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>By use of our corporate name; or</li><li>By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or</li><li>By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party’s site.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No use of Motorcycle Hype's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>iFrames</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Content Liability</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Your Privacy</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Please read Privacy Policy</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Reservation of Rights</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Removal of links from our website</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.</p>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title>Top 10 Bikes For Women &#124; Comparative Price List &#124; Specifications</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/bikes-for-women-comparative-price-list-specifications.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 18 May 2020 07:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=43</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The love for motorcycling is universal, irrespective of gender. Yet the fun experience lies in a slightly different note in the case of women than men. Women have different learning procedure than men, women have different requirements for riding a motorcycle comfortably. There are few physical body structures that are the root of the differential choices of the motorcycle between men and women. Height, body weight, strength being some a few of such. In spite of numerous<strong> <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html">problems faced by a female biker</a>,</strong> women are progressing and making up quite a good position the motorcycle riding. Every passing year has assured and motivated the women to call themselves a motorcycle rider.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In the modern era, 9% of the total motorcycle rider comprises of women. Women are equally taking interest and part in races, stunts, touring and vlogging, and so on.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Amidst all of the<strong><a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html"> hurdles in the life of a female rider</a></strong>, one of the most important things is to fight down all the snag and keep moving ahead to sway <strong>the flag of conquering.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Such an example is <strong><a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/shayna-texter-the-lady-rider-who-never-gave-up.html">Shayna texter, a role model</a> </strong>who never gave up on races and today made a very significant place in the world motorcyclist. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>And to reach that level of excellence it is indispensable to select a perfect wing for yourself.The partner to take you up there to your dreams overtaking every difficulty with its own speed and comforting you throughout the inevitable journey through its presence.Therefore, it is requisite to rightly choose a motorcycle, firstly, and importantly to persuade your need and secondly to comfort you and enhance your ability.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The reality portrays, that there is not a lot of resources out there catered to female riders. In a motorcycling industry that has been dominated by male riders for enough time, a solid selection of bike choices is just too bulky and heavy for some women. However, more top brands are creating bikes that a variety of riders can easily adapt to.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":1} -->
<h1><strong>What is the price list for the best-known motorcycle for&nbsp;lady riders?</strong></h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:table -->
<figure class="wp-block-table"><table><thead><tr><th scope="col"><strong>&nbsp;Bike Model</strong></th><th scope="col"><strong>Price&nbsp;</strong>(approx.)</th><th scope="col"><strong>Price in INR</strong>&nbsp;(approx.)</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Star Motorcycles V Star Custom/Classic (650)</td><td>$2,299</td><td>&nbsp;Rs.173,102.056</td></tr><tr><td>Kawasaki Ninja 250</td><td>&nbsp; $4,999</td><td>Rs.&nbsp;&nbsp;376,397.206</td></tr><tr><td>Honda Shadow Spirit 750</td><td>&nbsp; $5,599</td><td>Rs. 421,573.906</td></tr><tr><td>Kawasaki Vulcan 900</td><td>&nbsp; $7,999</td><td>Rs. 602,280.706</td></tr><tr><td>Harley Davidson Sportster 883</td><td>&nbsp; $8,999</td><td>Rs. 677,575.206</td></tr><tr><td>Indian Scout Bobber</td><td>&nbsp; $11,500</td><td>Rs. 365,886.75</td></tr><tr><td>Triumph Street Triple 675</td><td>&nbsp; $11,508</td><td>Rs. 866,489.106</td></tr><tr><td>Triumph Tiger 800&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp; $12,000</td><td>Rs. 903,534.000</td></tr><tr><td>Yamaha R6&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp; $12,199</td><td>Rs. 918,517.606</td></tr><tr><td>Harley Davidson Street Glide</td><td>&nbsp; $21,289</td><td>Rs. 1,602,944.610</td></tr></tbody></table></figure>
<!-- /wp:table -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":1} -->
<h1><strong>What are the best motorcycles for women?</strong> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>1.&nbsp;</strong><strong>Star Motorcycles V Star Custom/Classic (650):</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A unique approach has been established by Yamaha to design the V-Star. The major worth mentioning reasons for purchasing the V star custom or classic 350 middleweight cruiser are essentially styling, rider comfort, handling, authenticity, and value.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Category: </strong>Cruiser</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What are the specifications for V Star Custom?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type: </strong>Air-cooled 70-degree V-twin; SOHC, two valves per cylinder</li><li><strong>Displacement</strong>: 649cc&nbsp; &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>37.6 pound-feet at 3,000 pm</li><li><strong>Seat</strong> <strong>Height</strong>: 27.4 inches&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li><strong>F</strong><strong>uel</strong> <strong>Capacity</strong>: 4.2 gallons&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Weight</strong>: 514 pounds &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</li><li><strong>H</strong><strong>eight: </strong>42.3 inches&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Width:</strong> 34.6 inches&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>92.1 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp; <a href="https://bikez.com/motorcycles/yamaha_v-star_650_custom_2016.php" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Check out more specifications for V Star Custom</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://ic.maxabout.us//Bikes/Yamaha/V_Star_Custom//V_Star_Custom_090507_00.jpg/thumb/700"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What are the specifications for V Start Classic 650?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type:</strong> Type 40-cubic-inch (649cc) air-cooled 70° V-twin; SOHC, 2 valves/cylinder</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>649cc&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque:</strong>5.2kg-m (37.5 ft-lb)@ 3,000 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>27.9</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>4.2 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>214kg</li><li><strong>Height:</strong>43.5 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>36.6inches&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Length:</strong>96.5 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://bikez.com/motorcycles/yamaha_v_star_classic_650_2005.php" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Know more specifications </a><strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Why it is one of the best for women?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>V star classic 650 is a fantastic cruiser to start out on. It is a midsize modal which makes it a perfect ride-on for females.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The long, low styling, the authentic 40 cubic-inch V-twin, the painstaking attention to detail is astonishing and is capable of knocking you out.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Take one for a nice long trail ride, and you will find out why it is the list of one of the best. Big on value and great in looks, the V-Star 650 Classic pleases way above its weight. It’s a champion by an explicit decision.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In my personal opinion, lightweight forged pistons reduce reciprocating mass and engine vibration in the V Star Custom, while the ceramic cylinder-bore plating reduces much friction and improves heat transfer to the thick cooling fins. This makes the motorcycle more likely.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The clutch is the old, very reliable, wet multi-disc type and has a low-maintenance, the shaft-drive system serves as the final drive between the five-speed transmission and the rear wheel. To be honest,the motorcycle is very pleasurable and a perfect choice for women.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The bikes are perfect for they are light in weight and such motorcycles are highly preferable for the female rider, moreover who is a beginner.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2. Kawasaki Ninja 250:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are numerous female riders who take much interest in riding sportbikes.&nbsp; In that case, Ninja on the market makes a perfect bike for new riders who want a sporty ride.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;Category: </strong>Sports Touring</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What are the specifications for Kawasaki Ninja 250</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type:</strong> Parallel Twin, Liquid-cooled, 8-Valves, DOHC Engine</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>249cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque:</strong> 22.0 Nm @8200 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>29.3 inches&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>5.8 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>170 kg&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>43.89 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>28.14 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>82.09 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://www.motorcyclespecs.co.za/model/kawasaki/kawasaki_ninja_250r%20%2008.htm" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">More detailed specifications</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://www.seastarsuperbikes.co.uk/backend/uploads/images/models/ninja-250sl-2015/large/kawasaki_ninja_250sl_2.jpg"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Why is Kawasaki Ninja 250 ideal for female bikers?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Kawasaki Ninja has long been a popular choice for beginning riders and female motorcycle enthusiasts,<strong> </strong>because of its the look of a sportbike and a comfortable sit-up seating position.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The specificities such as lightweight, easy-to-maneuver, tranquil motorcycle are ideal for beginners who prefer modern technology in a sporty outlook.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>An updated package that they won't outgrow too soon. The Ninja 250 makes a great first bike for women riders who are those seeking a sportier ride.<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The seat height is on par for a sportbike, but thankfully in this particular, it's on the lower side newly minted motorcyclists can easily handle the bike. This adds to why women should choose Kawasaki Ninja 250.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3.Honda Shadow Spirit 750:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Honda Shadow Spirit 750 is one of the best Shadow models. This esteemed motorcycle has been hugely popular among women riders for decades. I even started my motorcycling life on a Shadow, a 1982 500cc model, so I can vouch for its accessibility for women riders.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp; Category:</strong> Cruiser</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What are the specifications for Honda Shadow Spirit 750:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type:</strong> 745cc liquid-cooled 52° V-twin</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>745cc &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque:</strong> 60.5Nm/44ft. Ib @300 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>27.6 inches&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>3.7 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight:</strong> 229 kg&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>44.3inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>36.2 inches &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>98.8inches</li><li><a href="https://www.motorcyclespecs.co.za/model/Honda/honda_shadow_spirit_750_05.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">More specifications of Honda Shadow Spirit 750</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<a href="https://pictures.topspeed.com/IMG/jpg/200812/honda-shadow-spirit--1.jpg" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"></a></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes Honda Shadow Spirit 750, ideal for female riders?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Many women loved the bike as I do, but the handlebars seemed too far of a reach for them as well, so a little modification is worthy enough to set a fantastic investment. Honda Shadow Spirit is a wonderful choice for experienced rider to be honest.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It might not be suitable enough for beginning female riders as some of the other mentioned models, but perhaps with just a little essence of confidence, this low seat height cruiser may be a good beginner pick that also suits women.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4. Kawasaki Vulcan 900:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It competes for edge to edge with the supercool V Star 950 and the Sportster 883 SuperLow in engine size. The Kawasaki Vulcan is very attractive and stylish in terms of looks.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; Category: </strong>Cruiser</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; What are the specifications for Kawasaki Vulcan 900?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type:</strong> 4-stroke, 55 V-twin, 4 valves per cylinder, SOHC, liquid-cooled</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>903cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>58.2 lb-ft @ 3500 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height:</strong>27.0 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>5.3 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight:</strong> 276 kg</li><li><strong>Height:</strong> 44.1 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>35.2 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>94.7 inches</li><li><a href="https://www.carandbike.com/kawasaki-bikes/vulcan-s" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">More Specifications of Kawasaki Vulcan</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://content.kawasaki.com/content/uploads/topFeatures/images/02_default_vulcan_ergoFit_mobile_1544059969.3981_vz2s1zrn.jpg?w=640"></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes Kawasaki Vulcan 900 Ideal for women?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>That shallow&nbsp;seat allows the majority of female riders to place both feet flat on the ground which is very helpful. Whereas the seat is the wide bucket type, it does narrow substantially as it reaches the tank so women who are short in height riders can scoot up to gain an extra half-inch when placing their feet on down, which is truly remarkable.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The handlebars are wide and low offering a relaxed riding position. Thus, this motorcycle is an apt and pleasure for choice for any female rider. Another attractive feature of the Vulcan 900 is the belt drive. It's lighter than a shaft drive and requires less maintenance than a chain.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5. Harley Davidson Sportster 883:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The national average height of a female is 5’5, so having such a motorcycle they can easily swing their leg over is important, especially when they are learning how to ride it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>And Harley Davidson Sportster is closer to the ground making it ideal for women. Apart from this, it has a classy and fantastic look which also makes it very favorite among people.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Category: </strong>Cruiser.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What are the specifications for Harley Davidson Sportster 883?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type: </strong>Air-cooled Evolution V-twin; 2 valves/cyl.</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>883cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>53.8 lb.-ft. @ 3,750 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>27.5 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>3.3 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>255 kg</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>44.09 inches</li><li><strong>Width:</strong> 32.28 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>88.58 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp;<a href="https://www.harley-davidson.com/in/en/motorcycles/2019/sportster/iron-883/detailed-specs-and-pricing.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Know more Specifications</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://ultimatemotorcycling.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/2020-harley-sportster-iron-883-buyers-guide-1.jpg"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes Harley Davidson Sportster 883 ideal for lady bikers?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is much known that Harley dominates over the female motorcycle market and bring around suitable bikes for women. This is exclusive from the list. The name of the motorcycle comes with a tag of SuperLow which would attract the fastest growing demographic of new riders, women.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The most noticeable and pleasurable qualities of the SuperLow is when you ride it as the new front end specs create a completely different Sportster feel, a more linear ride as the marketing notes indicate; that's really the best word to describe it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>6.&nbsp;Indian Scout Bobber:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Indian Scout Bobber has a fantastic and stylish appearance. The confidence inspired lean angles favors both beginner riders as well as experienced riders.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This, combined with the bike’s low center of gravity, provides an exceptionally high and low-speed combination of movements involving skill and dexterity: a gymnastics maneuver<strong>.&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;Category: </strong>Cruiser</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What are the Specifications for the Indian Scout Bobber:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type: </strong>Liquid-Cooled V-Twin (60 degrees)</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>1,133cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>97.7Nm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>25.6 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>3.3 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>259kg</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>41.5 inches</li><li><strong>Width:&nbsp; </strong>35.5 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>87.5 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://www.indianmotorcycle.com/en-us/scout-bobber/specs/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Check out all the specifications for Indian Scout Bobber</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://img.etimg.com/thumb/msid-59970440,width-640,resizemode-4,imgsize-133242/token-amount-of-50000.jpg"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes the Indian Scout Bobber ideal for women?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is a super ride choice.It is favored by a lot of female riders as the statics says. The Indian Scout Bobber is a fantastic piece and makes it a rider’s choice.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has a great, iconic “Indian” flair to it that has become so established in the brand identity, and it is simple to handle, the other reason for being user friendly. While this isn't necessarily one of the best motorcycles for beginners, it is lower to the ground than most others and is a great choice for females who might be on the smaller side.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>7.&nbsp;Triumph Street Triple 675:</strong><br>Triumph Street Triple is a middleweight streetfighter from British manufacturer, using a powerful 675 cc, 3-cylinder engine producing 77.21 BHP at 11054 rpm and 57.3 Nm at 8375 rpm.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It comes mated to a 6-speed gearbox and weighs just 188 kg. Triumph claims a top speed of 220 km/h for the motorcycle, providing the rider with loads of safety options like traction control and ABS.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This specific model comes with a twin 310 mm front brakes from Nissin and 220 mm single Brembo brake at the rear. It rivals Benelli TNT600i, Kawasaki ER-6N,&nbsp;and Ducati Monster 797 in its segment.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Category: </strong>Naked Sports</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What are the Specifications for Triumph Street Triple 675?&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type: </strong>765 ccs (46.68 cu in) transverse inline-3, DOHC, 4V/cyl, liquid-cooled</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>675cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque:</strong> 57.3 Nm @ 8375 rpm &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</li><li><strong>Seat Height:</strong>31.49 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>17.4 liters</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>188kg</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>41.73 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>29.13 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>80.90 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.bikewale.com/triumph-bikes/street-triple-675/specifications-features/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Detailed Specifications of Triumph Street Triple 675</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://www.bennetts.co.uk/bikesocial/reviews/bikes/triumph/triumph-street-triple-r-2008-2012-review-buying-guide%20//media/bikesocial/2019-may-images/triumph-street-triple---used-buying-guide-and-review/streettripler_thumb.ashx"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes the Triumph Street Triple 675 ideal for women?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If something that turns you on and that is nothing but running is the sleek, stripped-down, cafe racer-style look, then feel free to kindly blindly trust the Triumph Street Triple 675.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This bike carries a fantastic style statement, between a racer bike and a more classic look.&nbsp; It is an amazing choice for any female rider who has a short height because, it has got a lower, scooped-out seat (bucket seat) so it’s great and makes it look quite fascinating.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>8.&nbsp;Triumph Tiger 800 XR:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Setting the bar high for all-road, all-day riding comfort, the base model Tiger 800XR is as perfect for touring the world’s highways, as it is on the city streets, with superb off the beaten track handling too. It can be called as An All Rounder precisely.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Category: </strong>Adventure Motorcycle</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What are the specifications for Triumph Tiger 800?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type: </strong>799 cc (48.8 cu in), inline-3, 12-valve, DOHC</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>800cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>79 Nm @ 8,050 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>32 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>19 litre</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>210 kg</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>53.15 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>31.29 kg</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>87.20 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://www.carandbike.com/triumph-bikes/tiger-800" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Detailed Specification of Triumph Tiger 800</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://media.zigcdn.com/media/content/2015/Jul/triumph-tiger-800xr-india-launch-pic-image-photo-zigwheels-30072015-m1_720x540.jpg"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes Triumph Tiger 800 one of the best for lady bikers?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The bike suits the best for women with an adventurous taste. For a lot of female riders, particularly ones who’ve only ever ridden on the street, flat-footing it at stops is paramount for feeling confident. The Tiger’s rational seat height is indicative of Triumph’s desire to make the Tiger accessible and easy to use for all.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>9.&nbsp;Yamaha R6:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though the elegant Yamaha R6 has made its name for itself on the track, this marvelous bike isn’t just for races. You can get it in a 600cc engine, which is a perfect amount of burst for most riders who aren’t obsessed with the size of their engines. It’s also light and skillful and the styling is fantastic and aggressive.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Category: </strong>Sportbike</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What are the specifications for Yamaha R6?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type: </strong>4-stroke, liquid-cooled, DOHC, forward-inclined parallel 4-cylinder, 4-valves</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>599cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>61.7Nm (6.3kg-m) @ 10,500 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height: </strong>33.46 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity:</strong> 17 liters</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>190kg&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>45.27 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>27.36 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>80.31 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://autos.maxabout.com/bikes/yamaha/r6" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Know more detailed specifications</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://i.pinimg.com/originals/9e/5d/0c/9e5d0ce783cb8389703f02bd34b91a65.jpg"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes Yamaha R6 ideal for female riders?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Anyone might think that the Yamaha R6 is just a perfect companion on track, but it’s actually pretty swift on roads too. The 599cc, 133 bhp machine is effortless when it comes to steering, and stability. It is no wonder that its classy getup and multi-task can easily make you fall in love with it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Impressive Technology is what Yamaha is known for. But the R6 has got the full package. It may not be the most powerful bike on the market, but Yamaha is starting to prove that 600cc motorcycles are the way forward.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>10.&nbsp;Harley Davidson Street Glide:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Harley-Davidson isn’t exactly known for making light bikes (most of them are definitely not), but for some people, nothing will do but a Harley. If you’re a biker chick who won’t consider any other brand, then consider the Harley-Davidson Street Glide.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This bike is comparatively middleweight and much heavier than many of the other ones on this list, but for a Harley, it’s as light as a feather.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Category: </strong>Cruiser</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What are the specifications for Harley Davidson Street Glide:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Engine Type:</strong> Milwaukee-Eight 114</li><li><strong>Displacement: </strong>1868cc</li><li><strong>Maximum Torque: </strong>163 Nm @ 3000 rpm</li><li><strong>Seat Height:</strong> 27.4 inches</li><li><strong>Fuel Capacity: </strong>6 gallons</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>362 kg</li><li><strong>Height: </strong>52.75 inches</li><li><strong>Width: </strong>38.18 inches</li><li><strong>Length: </strong>96.5 inches</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.harley-davidson.com/us/en/motorcycles/2019/touring/street-glide/detailed-specs-and-pricing.html"><u>Check out the more detailed specifications</u></a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<img src="https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/C6ZV4jjjIuT0P2ddaJOcBIG9SRczK9dLf83tyqrUqqQ60JIEan2BALkgToV58_AjgTW2WyGlzxgSFvyhA3ea0rZoI4jCpvbOQyzicFlHO6JwH94e4p41CENwKZ7L9XiSiOL-R_Dk"></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What makes Harley Davidson Street Glide Suitable for women?</strong><br>As the major segment of lady riders are into riding middleweight cruisers, it is t an amazement to see the main offering bike throughout the previous five years make it into our best ten listed motorcycles.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Harley-Davidson Street Glide has been the most highlighted bike among all riders since its presentation in 2006. It has set in motion the custom bagger rage with its low threw and classic smooth styling.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Conclusion:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We have tried to list down the amazing motorcycles with its price details, specification, and exclusive features. We main aim is to help you choose the ride motorcycle for your need and pleasure. Do not compromise on comfort and fascinations when buying something for your ownself or thinking to gist something to your close ones. To conclude, “that was a happy ride”, make sure you choose the perfect companion and enjoy as you fly with it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Top 8 Tips For Female Solo Traveller &#124; Motorcycle Rider</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/tips-for-female-solo-traveller-motorcycle-rider.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 24 May 2020 07:13:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=46</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In one of our previous articles, we discussed <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html">the problems of a female rider</a>. To start from family pressure to not venture out alone coupled with an undisciplined, aggressive driving culture on roads, the hindrances faced by the female rider are numerous if counted. Ther are plunging numbers of women who are taking much interest in motorcycling and moving in quite a pace along with the men. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Motorcycling can no longer be tagged as a manly thing. For women are equally contributing to the adventure sport, be it racing, touring, or stunts.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Female motorcycle enthusiasts are soon seen to choosing solo trips, turning their deaf ears to all the stereotype customs and mentalities. They are proving it over time that, gender is cannot stand as a differentiating parameter. With dedication and heights of confidence, females are achieving new altitudes of achievements and self-esteem.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Women are eventually learning and interpreting how to work for one’s own self against all odd and look after one’s own needs and dreams even if it is to see the world alone.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But when you plan to kick start to the execution of your plans, the first thing that strikes is,&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Is it going to safe? Is it okay for a girl to travel along the unknown roads? What if some tragedy falls overhead? How is she going to deal with the matter of restroom? What if she faces some mechanical problem with her bike in the midst of the journey?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Yes, these are some inevitable truths of society and hard to overcome norms in the path of modernization. But these are not impossible to scribble off. No one would disagree with the statement that, ‘when there is a will, there’s a way’. And to reach out to the way is to take some necessary precautions and preventions s we decide to set off for solo motorcycle rides being a woman.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The female riders who have made solo rider exclaim that, the satisfaction of riding solo is truly soul-soothing and stands by the right definition of self-satisfaction. The feeling initiates all of them to encourage other women to ride solo and gather a lifetime of experience for themselves.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are one such woman who’s ready to get on the saddle and planning to ride alone, here’s a useful guide for you. So here, we shall talk about some necessary precautions a women biker must take to have a safe and healthy ride. Not necessarily they will flush out all the fears but yes, they potent to make the ride better and safer.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here are the following tips:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1. Safety comes first!</strong> -</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Being a female motorcycle rider, safety is the one most important thing to be concerned about. Safety here does not only indicate to end rides before dusk or keeping oneself away from strangers, it conveys a lot more.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>As a rider, especially when planning to travel solo, you must be capable enough to handle the basic mechanical maintenance issues of your bike. Changing your bike’s flat tire in specifically one of them. As it gets difficult to find a mechanic in the unknown roads and highways.&nbsp;</li><li>You must not forget to carry all the necessary tools and gears of your two-wheeler.</li><li>choose proper comfortable gears for yourself, use special vest if you plan to travel at night.</li><li>Must not forget to carry enough dry food and water. It is always appreciable to carry protein-rich tucks.</li><li>Make sure that your carry a set of an identity card and medical informatics handy. So, it is easily accessible in case of an emergency.&nbsp;</li><li>It is always appreciable to choose not to talk or share many details with a stranger and on-road unknown fellow.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong> 2. Be confident and dress as if you are local - </strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It is very important to put on a confident attitude when traveling alone and amidst strangers, even if you are not. </li><li>Nothing is scarier than being lost in an unknown place. Make sure people around you should not bother you for being a girl visiting along. </li><li>Whenever and wherever you decide to take a halt for food or for a change, look around, try and observe if it is safe. </li><li>Analyze and read the instructions outside and in the reception before switching to eat or stay in a hotel. </li><li>Dressing as a local is an amazing and tricky way to avoid the attention of people around. </li><li>Dressed as a local is one easy way to go with the flow of hoi polloi and not be taken for a tourist-target.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3. Make a scheme to Start early and Finish before the nightfall-</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Always schedule your rides beforehand and it is preferable for female riders to plan it before the nightfall. Because after the dusk it not only become unsafe to travel but also to choose the right directions and roads. To add on, it is also problematic to figure out the condition of roads.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The unknown roads can actually be dangerous to travel at night time. In case of any mechanical breakout on the bike, it is difficult to find a mechanic. Moreover, after traveling thoroughly throughout the day, it is wiser to rest and prepare for the next day.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Also traveling with some time at hand is a good idea as any unforeseen situation can be handled effectively in the daytime unlike at night when you are alone and there’s no one to help. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4. Be aware of your surrounding all the time -</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When traveling alone, one must remember it is only her eyes and ears to ensure if her belongings her safe and secure. Obviously it is really quite a deal to carry all your luggage and belongings to the restroom all the time but it is better to never take a chance. You must keep a regular check at your baggage and keep your zips never undone.  It should be kept in mind all the time you must listen to your intuitions throughout your journey. Whenever you feel something is not right or feel some kind of absurdity, it is recommended to walk out of there as soon as possible.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You must also learn to say a firm ‘no’ when you decide to travel alone and make sure we don’t offend someone or break into a fight with someone. If a difficult situation arouses if is best to walk out rather than fighting back. Truly it takes a lot of courage for a female to choose to travel alone to unknown places and to create such memories you need to overlook some bad times while your journey. Touchwood, no one ever gets into such trouble.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5. Leave an aisle of your journey -</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is a wonderful way to maintain a safety protocol. Not only females but also male riders must follow such safety strategies when traveling. Through social media keep your loved ones updated about your day to day plans.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These will help them to trace you in case of emergency and would also help them t know your whereabouts. Inform them about where you are going to check-in at the end of the day. It is great if someone has your back and worry about if you fail to drop any update in a certain interval of time.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>6. Set up a backup plan and keep alternatives for navigation -</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is very necessary to keep a plan B chocked out, for you never know what arrives in which situation. Preventions are better than cure, so is Plan B even though Plan A is agreed to be reputed enough.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In the era of modern technology and high facilities, it is better to carry paper maps of your routes and locations of stay. A battery led torch, women safety needs, and others because one never knows in what situation she is going to be in. it is preferable to be prepared for the worst and not completely rely on gadgets. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>7. Mentally prepare yourself for the ride -</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sometimes, it becomes very monotonous when traveling for too long ina go and one often tends to start losing her interest. So it is very necessary to keep one’s focus straight and keep moving forward, which takes a lot of consistency and mental preparation from beforehand. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Homesick is a very often feeling when into such long travel schedules but with continuous suppression of the very leading back emotion, one can gain control over the whole tour and enjoy coping up with all the situations. These are all the irrevocable part of the journey which you choose so make sure you don’t compromise the shoes you have chosen fo yourself. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>8. Indulge yourself into the ride:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There will be countless difficulties, but amidst all do not forget to embrace the journey with enjoyment and fun. Learn, enjoy, and keep moving forward creating memories. This is one such big shot which is not everyone’s cup of tea. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is one such act to prove yourself an independent strong woman, so don’t make any compromise about this. This is one best time you will ever have with yourself. So make it count. This is one best thing in a lifetime and the memories you create through this are accessible to cherish all your life. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So, keep traveling solo and inspired a lot of others to do the same. Fly high in the sky you have painted for yourself.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_content_score]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[top-8-tips-for-female-solo-traveller-motorcycle-rider]]></wp:meta_value>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Top 4 Female Motorcycle  Stunt Riders</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/female-motorcycle-stunt-riders.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 31 May 2020 07:24:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=50</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Life with a motorcycle is way beyond honking in traffic, parking it safely or skills to avoid congestion. It can be of greater heights when you are crazy about it, ‘irrespective of gender’.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Women today hold themselves in such altitudes where they stand on the same table where men do. Scribbling off the stereotypes they are heading into every activity known to be ‘Manly’. Beyond the <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html">Problems of a Lady Biker</a>, females are still taking part in all the possible adventure sport and other dwellings.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Such an <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/shayna-texter-the-lady-rider-who-never-gave-up.html">inspiration female figure is SHAYNA TEXTER</a>. She is an American Flat Track Racer, who over shone boys in the particular forum.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Women don’t hold themselves back even when it comes to stunting. &nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":1} -->
<h1>What is stunting?</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Stunting is a motorcycle sport that is characterized by stunts, which involves careful and super level of acrobatic skills of the motorcycle and sometimes the rider. Common maneuvers in stunt riding are wheelies, stoppies, and burnouts.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The category of motorcycle used for stunts is sportbikes.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sportbikes make it accessible to good speed and acceleration to its riders. It also provides better cornering and braking capabilities than any standard or cruiser motorcycles.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This type of motorcyclesis characterized by a high-performance engine and brakes, advanced suspension systems, and a lightweight frame. All of these bits make a sportbike ideal for stunting.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With changing time, the sight of seeing someone jumping cars, buses, people, and even canyons on two wheels has generated a lot of fantastic chaos among crowds all across the globe.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The sport, stunting has relatively highlighted a number of unknown motorcycle enthusiasts into overnight superstars. The women who stunt are less in number but they are absolute stunners.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Who are the top Females who do stunting?&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1.&nbsp;Sarah Lezito</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Who is Sarah Lezito?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sarah Lezito is a fantastic female stunt rider, who into making her name for her own self in the category of freestyle in sportbikes.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sarah Lezito is only 24 years old. She has been a very passionate motorcycle enthusiast since childhood and started riding a motorcycle when she was only 13 years old.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://motoridersuniverse.com/uploads/news/a7/17/720/1137205a5e0db73a717.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Where is Sarah Lezito from?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sarah Lezito is from Champagne-Ardenne in France.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Life and Career of Sarah Lezito:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sarah Lezito started off at the age of 13 and with time and age, she grew to be progressing to faster and bigger bikes. She has been tagged as ‘the best stuntwomen in the world’. She is charming in looks and stunting.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She is now an icon in the BMW Motorrad Community. Sarah Lezito exhibited her talent in the Stunt Riding World Championship, leaving back a countless number of men. Sarah Lezito with all her achievements simple proves that ‘Stunting is just her Cup Of Tea’!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Initially, Sarah Lezito started her biking with her friends in one of her friend’s All-Terrain Vehicle (AVT), in the vineyard in her neighborhood. She kept up struggling and learning the tricks and peaks of stunts with her friend’s bike until she got the first motorcycle for herself. She was only 16, got herself a Yamaha DT125X Supermoto, her first ride on in the glorious direction.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Yamaha DT125X possessed a 124cc engine that made 15bhp of maximum power and had a top speed of 105 km/h.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>During the launch of the KTM 125 Duke, she became the brand ambassador for KTM. She received a Ktm Duke 125 after she became the brand ambassador. Midst all the initial achievements, Sarah Lezito got herself a Honda CBR 600RR. The supersport’s higher power gave this talented, capable rider the freedom to widen her stunning abilities and propagate better practices.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She practiced in a parking station, which she usually referred to her workplace with zero colleagues and absolutely no work except for parking. The police and residents knew her, as they saw her practicing wheelies and truly admirable stunts every day.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In the year 204, she took part in the Stunt riding world championship, which happened in Poland. She makes her first remarkable achievement there, after two years. She acquired the ninth place among 75 male riders in the event and acquires her first fan moment in front of the entire world.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She chose her passion for anything else. There is no space for shyness or regrets when it comes to her adventure sport. Her talent made her al the way to Hollywood, Sarah was requested to work for The Marvel Blockbuster, Avenger 2.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In 2016, she got her hands over the&nbsp; BMW R 1200 RT in the thriller Inferno. With the jobs as a stunt double, contests, shows, and shootings, Sarah Lezito has meanwhile been known all over the world.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/aeMEnnO_460s.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Despite her talent, it is her hard work and perseverance that fetched her to the world’s stage of recognition. She earned herself a title and nothing holds bigger fame than that. She is known to be dancing on her bikes with her pleasant, clear, and flexible moves. It is an absolute pleasure to watch her.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2. Anam Hashim:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Who is Anam Hashim?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Anam Hasim is a young, bubbly college girl who started riding at the age of 5 and eventually upgraded here bikes and thus makes her name in the India Book of Records. At 18 Aman&nbsp; Hashim is the youngest female stunt rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She is from Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>How old is Anam Hashim?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Anam Hashim is 25 years old. She is a member of a motorcycle stunt group in Pune, which includes three members among which Anam is the only girl.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.vervemagazine.in/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Anam-Hashim-featured.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Life and Career:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She is a young rider, who started riding when her feet barely touched the ground sitting on a motorcycle.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She says, her father is the biggest inspiration and motivation behind her success.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She was a part of the sixth edition of Asia’s largest biking Festival, India Bike Week in Goa at the age of 24.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Anam Hashim is known to be the first women to ride, to Khardung La, which is over 2510 km on a TVS Scooty, during the Himalayan Highs. This made her write her name in the India Book of Records in the year 2015.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Anam Hashim is the only Indian Stunt Rider who is a female to participate and win an International Event in 2017 that is Cross Country Valley Racing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The other remarkable of Anam is, she completes the Desert Storm Racing Event, which is known to be one of the most difficult racing competitions, in which no except for her completed in the first attempt.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Despite being a stunt rider, she excels at racing rallies, this thoroughly explains her love for the bike and high determination.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She claims Leah Peterson to be ideal in Motorcycle Stunt Riding. She plans to start a professional course or female stunt riders.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.theindianfeed.in/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/19122527_1457905330921822_813724070108463104_n-889x1024.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Currently, she does stunts on an Apache RTR 180 and desires to buys, Honda Fireblade, Yamaha R6, and Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She dreams big and promises to take the stunt riding more miles. She desires to participate in XDL International someday and would love to participate in the international biking events, she says in an interview.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3. Chesca Miles:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Who is Chesca Miles?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Chesca Miles, real named as Maya Chesca Miles is The United Kingdom’s First professional female stunt rider. She is Streetbike Freestyle Stunt Rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>How Old is Chesca Miles?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Chesca Miles in 28 years old. She is a motorcycle enthusiast and started to ride in late 2010.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://speedsociety.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Screen-Shot-2017-12-28-at-12.14.21-PM.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Life and Career:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Chesca Miles is a multi-talented personality, who world on numerous genres, starting from acting, body fitness, modeling, painting, sports, Stunting, and so on. She is an epitome of beauty with vivid talent. Looking at all the dimensions she embraces, it can be concluded that a person can thrive and strive to bring out the best in herself with the utmost dedication and hard work.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4. Leah Peterson:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Who is Leah Peterson?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Leah Peterson is a passionate female stunt rider with more to her happening life. She is an engineer, with immense tech-related knowledge. Wheelies, burnouts, bunnyhops, and drifts - maneuvers usually handled aggressively, but here, with a sense of calm.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>How&nbsp;old is Leah Peterson?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Leah Peterson is 25 years old. Beauty with a brain&nbsp;is the best title given to her.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://vidreactor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/woman-motorcycle-stunt.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Life and Career:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She is an amazing top class female stunt rider. Her stunts are hardcore and the way she performs them with ease is worth millions appreciate. She won a million hearts with her dedication and hard work.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Miss Petersen is here as part of the 2013 Motul Bike Festival, which also counts as the first leg of her Asia tour.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Apart from a wide category of statuesque postures, she also burns plenty of rubber in the shape of the plume of smoke billows from her back wheel during a burnout.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>She is one of a kind and unfurls the flag of women empowerment high up in the air.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":1} -->
<h1><br><br><br>Conclusion:</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These epic females who live as inspirations motivating other women around need no music to dance. They sway with the gusty sound of the engine, showcasing their talent hub with smoothness and grace. They break down the petty norms against womanhood and shout out loud <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/i-live-as-i-ride.html">I LIVE AS I RIDE</a> with their life and deeds. Amidst the <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html">problems faced by a female rider</a>, they are the butterflies who set the world in amusement with their amazing stunt. The world awaits to watch them, dancing on their vehicle blissfully.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
