							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Women Biker Outfit &#124; What Should A Woman Wear On A Motorcycle</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/women-biker-outfit.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 01 Jun 2020 07:37:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=52</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I heard someone saying that <strong>buying gears and apparel for the female bike rider</strong> is one of the problems from the list of <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html">Problems faced by female riders</a>. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Is it so?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Yes, it is, for only a small section of the entire motorcyclist forum comprises lady riders, so the women riders section often gets ignored. Most motorcycling gear and outfit manufacturers maintain a specificity of male attire and gears collection only.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So, it becomes difficult for female motorcycle rider (even female passengers) to get a perfect fit and budget-friendly outfit and other requisites easily.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To add on, a United States survey conveys that in the midst of 27 million motorcycle riders in the United States, only 6.7 million makes up the women, in which women by a percentage of 12.5 are the owner while rest remains the passengers. It is tragic to understand that the female passenger feels there is not much need for gears and the importance of proper outfit. They do not think of the consequence of what if they fall from the motorcycle.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So be you a motorcycle owner or a motorcycle passenger it is severely important to wear protective pieces of equipment.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The apparels vary with the alteration of the category of motorcycling. The female riders outfit differ for stunting to touring, flat-track racing to city dwelling. Thus, it is very important to choose a rider’s outfit and wisely enough from a good brand and authenticated store.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>What are the clothing pieces that make up female riders’ safety and smart outfit?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1. Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is the most basic and important part of the female rider’s outfit. No matter how long or short your ride is, no matter if you are the owner of the motorcycle or just a passenger, wearing a helmet should be a must.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It takes a minute mistake to meet an accident and it can fatal. Accidents can happen anytime and anywhere even at times not because of your fault. So it is best to choose to wear a helmet even when you are around your neighborhood on your motorcycle.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Research claims, Helmets are estimated to prevent 37 percent of deaths and 67 perfect of brain injury in case of a motorcycle accident.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Wearing a helmet is not a mandate in some countries while some countries made it compulsory to wear helmets up to a certain age group. Such a country is Texas, which made it mandatory to wear helmet up to an age group of 20.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Helmets are basically the most essential part of the clothing of a woman rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>What is the factor on which a choice of Helmet depends?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;The weight of the helmet:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is a big factor when you decide to choose a helmet for yourself. I think Mid-weighing helmets should be preferred to very light or heavy weighting helmets. Because it at times, become a little difficult to ride in higher speed (say, while touring) with lighter helmets and I guess there is no need for an explanation why any female rider should not choose a heavy helmet.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I mean, who enjoys weights on the head?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Authentication:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>While buying a helmet it is highly recommendable to check on its authenticity. You must buy it when it is worth it. Always look for the DOT sticker on your helmet (inside or outside). DOT, Department Of Transportation, authorized helmets are tested and are a safer buy and use.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Size Of the Helmet:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As you buy a helmet, check if it fits you perfectly. A not so well-fitting helmet can be severely dangerous. It is recommended to buy helmets with adjustable features.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Visor:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It varies in quality and clarity. Keep a note to try and verify it when you buy a new helmet for yourself.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Above all, a helmet must be comfortable and should not hinder your rider. It must look smart and classy with its safety intact.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2. Women’s Motorcycling Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Comfort is a matter of huge concern when it comes to riding for stunting. The wrong choice of costumes can actually be harmful to any rider. It might help in bringing a bad accident or a bad can harm the rider if not with the proper protective outfit.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Women are always much alarmed about fashion senses when compared to men in general. Thus, getting something stylish and safely perfect is very essential.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is good to keep two to three riding jackets in your closet because the choice of jacket is expected to differ with weather and ride style.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The price of the jackets varies widely depending on the feature and material.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Alike knowing, <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/top-10-bikes-for-women-comparative-price-list-specifications.html">the ideal motorcycle for a female rider</a> it is essential to choose a perfect jacket for the rider. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Usually, there are jackets available that can be used in multiple seasons, which are quite impressive and quality is worthy enough.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Check on the right fitting to your women’s biker jacket. It is preferable to wear jackets with long sleeves most of the time as it not only helps to avoid accidental injuries but also acts as a protection shield from sunburn.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3. Women’s Motorcycling Pants:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is well suggestible to wear female riding pants which are available. They are absolutely protective and add a tinge of old school biker’s look.&nbsp; They are comfortable for the women’s riding pants are designed for the sole purpose of riding. The pants are a bit stretchy and are straight cut. The pants have Kelvar and armor at the knees and seat for abrasion resistance.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As an alternative for the Motorcycling pants, a thick set of denim does the job well. It fetches the look in the scale of style to a different level. Though Leather and synthetic materials pants are more preferable.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A new choice in the riding closet for all the female rider is Kelvar Leggings which are also known as Motorcycle leggings fr women. Leggings are much in favoritism for every woman.&nbsp; So why a no to your ever favorite apparel when riding?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Choose yourself the best and comfortable pants to have a worry-free, undisrupted ride.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4. Women’s Motorcycling Boots:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The variety when it comes to choosing boots for women riders in plenty, which is a happy thing as women always tend little fascinated about shoes and accessories.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The boots with ankle coverage should be chosen for rides.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A lot of boots are now available in the market which is protective, beneficial, and copes up well with style statement.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Moreover, there are vented boots available for a perfect go in the warm season.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Take the points are under note when you buy boots for riding,&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Do not compromise on its comfort scale for styling,</li><li>Choose the right fitting shoes,</li><li>Make sure it ensure ankle coverage,</li><li>Choose boots with the least heel.&nbsp;</li><li>Try and buy authenticated and,</li><li>It is preferable to read reviews and they make a choice.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In most cases the size of shoes varies with brands so, read the return policy carefully when buying online.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5. Women Motorcycling Gloves:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Gloves are a vital part of your entire rider’s outfit. But mostly it is ignored.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The choice of gloves varies from rider to rider. Some like it thin to get maximum control over her throttle while some like it with armors on the knuckles securing maximum protection.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There is even choice for gloves that are season suitable, with lighter weights and vents.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is very important to protect your hands while riding so do not make any compromise with the quality and specs of your gloves.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>6. Women Motorcycling Hair Dos:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you have long hair, it is better not to put it up into a top bun, this gets tugged down when you wear your helmet on and create bulges and pressure points. It becomes quite disturbing and uncomforting.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is suggestible to try putting your hair in a low ponytail or braid that will be out of the way of your helmet. This will also help prevent your hair from moving around underneath your helmet and possibly getting into your face. Though braiding would be the best option to choose and it also prevents your hair to get tangled which is a real big deal. There are also a few hair accessories available for women. It’s commendable if you agree to try any.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Conclusion:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Say Absolute no to loosely fitting clothes. </li><li>Avid letting your hair open.</li><li>Use proper and comfortable gear to ensure safety and protection.</li><li>it better to carry extra gears and pieces of your riding outfit when traveling and especially when <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/top-8-tips-for-female-solo-traveller-motorcycle-rider.html">Travelling solo</a>.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Alike the RIGHT MOTORCYCLE CHOICE FOR A FEMALE RIDER, the choice of gears and clothes is also very crucial.</li><li>Use branded and authenticated products.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Despite <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html">all the problems of female riders</a>, women are riding in the different forums, be it stunting or flat track racing. <strong><a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/shayna-texter-the-lady-rider-who-never-gave-up.html">SHAYNA TEXTER </a></strong>or <strong><a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/top-4-female-motorcycle-stunt-riders.html">SARAH LEZITO</a></strong> the real heroes who keep inspiring countless females to show love for motorcycles. Ride with the safety intact and pride in your eyes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>10 Best Ladies Helmets For Female Motorcycle Riders</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/helmets-for-female-motorcycle-riders.html</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 04 Jun 2020 07:56:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=57</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Riding a motorcycle is very prevalent in the modern era. For the sake of passion or profession, a lot of people take part in the sport of motorcycle riding. Touring, Stunting, Racing are various branches of motorcycle riding.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Irrespective of the different realm of motorcycling you ride, safety concern remains the most important factor.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One must not compromise on her gears and apparels. It is very important to know what makes a <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/women-biker-outfit-what-should-a-woman-wear-on-a-motorcycle.html">perfect outfit for a female motorcycle rider</a>, which ensures her safety as well as gets well scored in the scale of style. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Helmets, that tops the list of a motorcyclist’s outfit. Helmets are much important for riders. Helmets are known to prevent around 37 perfect chance of death in bike accidents. The same article unfurls it restricts a 67 percent chance of brain injury due to a bike accident. It is always necessary to remember that safety is a huge concern for a big day- all-day ride as well as a&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For every female rider today, style statement is a big factor. Thus, it becomes essential to choose a helmet that satisfies styling and also ensure a hundred percent safety.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Know all the necessary points before choosing a<a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/women-biker-outfit-what-should-a-woman-wear-on-a-motorcycle.html"> perfect helmet</a> for yourself. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Do not forget to check on the comfort, size, and quality of the motorcycling helmet you choose to buy.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For helping you choose the best, ensuring quality and styling, here we suggest some truly amazing choices of Helmets for female bikers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Following are the Best Helmets for a Female Rider:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;<strong>1. Shoei RF SR Helmet:</strong>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The helmet by the Japanese Company, Shoei tops the list because it the perfect helmet one could ever ask for. Shoei, the company have been trying to launch quality product combining their innovation and listening to all the problems of riders. They have been trying to present the best of their offerings.&nbsp; And all the hard works paid off. The product ensures high comfort to secure safety. Any female rider trying this, can not deny that it is worthy to buy.&nbsp;<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>The key features of the Shoei RF SR Helmet are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>The helmet weighs around 4.7 Pounds for the size XL.&nbsp;</li><li>The Shoei RF SR is a&nbsp; full-face helmet, with a fantastic classy look.&nbsp;</li><li>The helmet is a dual-layer, multi-density EPS liner which facilitates better absorption and comfort.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>The helmet has plenty of vents, it has outflow vents on the top rear which prevents fogging up of visor even when riding on a humus day.&nbsp;</li><li>The Helmet has intakes above the visor and below the chin.</li><li>It also has proper space around the ear for the usage of Bluetooth earpiece.</li><li>The Shoei helmet is available in a wide range of pretty solid colors.&nbsp;The color options available are black, deep matte grey, basalt grey, matte black, tangerine, and white.&nbsp;</li><li>They are aerodynamically checked for wind tunnels.&nbsp;</li><li>With vents, it can be a bit noisy, but the vents are to enhance the rider’s comfort level.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://www.cycleworld.com/resizer/yUxbx3dFbdJCC6ozGASxjUs2p8s=/760x570/arc-anglerfish-arc2-prod-bonnier.s3.amazonaws.com/public/G564E2QTIRONZZN7OHECLD37KI.jpg"><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3f6vlMx" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest Price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Female rider’s helmet, Shoei RF SR comes with 5 years manufacturer warranty. Since it is best prescribed to change your helmet after every 5 years, thus it can be stated that&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>It comes with a lifetime warranty.&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It comes with a little high pocket pinch. But it is worth the investment. It is to be noted that quality products always come for a premium price.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2. LS2 Helmets Citation Vantage:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The LS2 Helmets, citation vantage is a full-face ideal for women helmet made to add a sporty look to the rider. The helmet makes a wonderful choice for the ones who want a strong yet light weighing helmet for themselves. And every female rider prefers a lightweight helmet over any. The oval-shape of the helmet ensures maximum protection and comfort to the women rider throughout the journey.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>The key features of the LS2 Citation Vantage Helmet are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It weighs somewhere around 4 pounds, which is commendable and highly women-specific.</li><li>It has a dual shield system to protect the female rider’s eyes when riding under the sun, as most women prefer traveling during the daytime.</li><li>The sun shield opens and closes with a flip of a switch, which is accessible to operate with a gloved hand.</li><li>It comes with a good venting system, it has two vents on the forehead and one on the chin. The other two outflow vents at the back of the head for outflow are more than enough.</li><li>It is also well known for its integrated safety characteristics, like the patterns on the sides of the helmets glows for a consistent time period. This increases the safety of riding at the time.</li><li>The LS 2 Citation Vantage comes in 10 different shades and patterns.&nbsp;</li><li>The color choices available for the same is seven, which includes, glossy dark Orion, matte black, hunter orange, shiny black, hunter tonal black, hunter white, vantage red, vantage yellow and razor.&nbsp;</li><li>The chin strap is made in a way that can open with gloved hands.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://www.bikeworld.ie/image/cache/data/helmets/ls2/2019-range/ls2503991007-800x800.jpg"></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2BF0WpX" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to check the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The helmet is reasonably priced and a good option for women riders.&nbsp; The only criteria it lacks is, it is not as tough as other helmets. To add on, a more chin vent would have enhanced the breathability and would have accelerated more comfort during long rides.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3. GDM DK 140 MB Duke Series Female Motorcycle Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Scoring absolutely best, from the stylish point of view it is an amazing choice for female riders. It is made up of lightweight poly-alloy, to make the helmet lightweight and popular among female users. The helmet structure is made for high protection and is also aerodynamic. It is a full-face helmet which is a great choice for women riders.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;The key features for the GDM DK 140 MB are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It weighs near about 3.8 Pounds.&nbsp;</li><li>This is a no-frill, full-face helmet that does a great job.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>It comes with a dual visor. One is a standard transparent visor and the other is the sun visor to give extra protection.</li><li>It is known for its durability.&nbsp;</li><li>The inside padding is soft and very comfortable.&nbsp;</li><li>The double D shaped chin strap makes the helmet more secure while riding</li><li>The venting system is praiseworthy with two forehead vents and chin vents.&nbsp;</li><li>The helmet allows a lot of airflows, as the chin area is open wider when compared with other full-face helmets.</li><li>The helmet comes is only one color and five size options.&nbsp;</li><li>The color availability is matte black.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://i.pinimg.com/564x/3d/b0/f0/3db0f00426ec76c7ae42ec4de3a46d4e.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2ATJn55" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It comes with a warranty tenure of 3 years and by the standard law, it is quite a good option to choose. It is reasonably priced. The classy look and shape make it a popular choice among women riders.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4.&nbsp;Shoei Necton II Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Shoei Necton II is another great creating of the Japanese Brand Shoei. Their creations are ever wonderful. Company Shoei still uses manpower to manufacture its products and maybe that is a big reason behind the success of their products.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;The key features of the Shoei Necton II Helmet for women are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It is a flagship modular helmet by Shoei with extremely high durability.</li><li>The shape of the helmet is also very fascinating. The sleek shape gives it a stylish look.</li><li>It weighs somewhere around 8 pounds, which can be called as a drawback.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But this is because of the solid structure it has.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It is very flexible to use. Despite being a full-face helmet, it can also be accessed as a half coverage helmet.&nbsp;</li><li>The company claims the claimed they made it with the thought of the rider’s comfort. The rider may change the full coverage to open helmet when in traffic or for a change when traveling.</li><li>The Necton two has a good venting configuration. With two vents upon the forehead and to vent near the chin makes the airflow well while riding.&nbsp;</li><li>The helmet comes with a switch at the back of the helmet to bring down the sun visor and this integrated feature can be accessed with the rider gloves on.</li><li>The Helmet from Shoei comes in five varying sizes and nine color options.&nbsp;</li><li>The color options that can be availed includes black, matte black, matte grey, wine red,&nbsp;Light silver, metallic matte blue, white, and wine.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cyclegear.com/_a/product_images/0224/3530/shoei_gt_air_pendulum_tc1.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2XIHvFy" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to check out the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Necton II comes with a warranty period of 5 years. In spite of being of the heaviest motorcycle helmets for women, you might feel your wallet light after paying for it. Well, it is a classic choice for it is authenticated. But it is recommended to check on the return policy before ordering it (if ordering online) because the size variation is restricted to some.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5. Monarch Bell Vortex Female Motorcycle Riders Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Company that manufactures the Bell Vortex women motorcycle rider’s helmet was the ones to built World’s First Helicopter. So how do you suspect ill about a helmet making?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is made of light weighing polycarbonate alloy shell. It is extremely durable with ultra-thick padding and no discomforts near the jaw.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;The key features of the Bell Vortex helmet are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It weighs 1 Pound, which makes it absolutely pleasureful.</li><li>If you choose the highest safety standards with high durability you can blindly trust on Vortex.&nbsp;</li><li>It has a velocity Flow Ventilation which helps to keep the rider cool and this is one reason that makes it very famous among female riders.</li><li>The bike also has the Flow Adjust System to enhance, temperature control for a better choice of environment.</li><li>The helmet is very well ventilated, with two vents near the forehead and two on either cheek along with two other vents on the top for the outflow of air.&nbsp;</li><li>It has an extra visor, the sun visor for extra protection for day time rides. At the same time it little unpleasant to ride with a sun visor at night time.&nbsp;</li><li>There is a restriction in its size availability and color choice.</li><li>The interior of the helmet is removable and washable.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51hMyakxA3L._SX466_.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2UCHwsL" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Helmet cost much less when compared to other helmets. It assures a quieter journey because it has a padded wind collar that helps to keep wing sound exterior and even the traffic noise when riding in cities. The helmet is only available in XX-Large size, which is very unfortunate because it is truly a great helmet for woman rider, so if the size fits you don’t miss the chance to let it go.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br><br><br><br><strong>6. Freedconn Dual visor Women Motorcycle Helmets:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To be specific, the helmet gives defines technology and ensures we live in the highest state of modernization. Apart from being a full-coverage helmet, it is an absolutely comfortable product.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The helmet has an intercom Bluetooth system already built in it, which is remarkable. We often buy a helmet that has much space for using earpiece while riding but ‘ a helmet with Bluetooth system already built-in’ in something really remarkable.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;Key features of the Freedconn Dual Visor Helmet are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It weighs somewhere near about 4.5 Pounds.&nbsp;</li><li>The helmet ensures ultimate safety, with full face coverage, and also enables the rides to use it as an open helmet when needed.&nbsp;</li><li>It also has an integrated sun visor, to avoid the difficulty in a ride during the daytime.</li><li>The light weighing ABS system comes with a wonderful and advanced ventilation system for better rider comfort.</li><li>&nbsp;The best part is it comes with a Bluetooth set already installed in it to communicate with other riders at a distance up to 500 meters.&nbsp;</li><li>It allows single button control for receiving calls, changing tunes, and connecting with your fellow riders. The button can be used with gloved hands.</li><li>The vents are well placed in the helmets to help the rider have the most comfort.</li><li>The Freedconn is available in a number of colors and is available in three sizes. The colors available are White, red, glossy black, and matte black.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://spacemazing.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/ILM-Bluetooth-Integrated-Modular-Flip-up-Full-Face-Motorcycle-Helmet-Sun-Shield-Mp3-Intercom-300x298.jpg"><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2Ybv2cu" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to check the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Since it has a Bluetooth system installed in it, it is better to read the return policy, warranty grants properly before buying. The size available is less and with more advanced features the size may different from standard sizes, so it is recommended to check the right size for your helmet. The amusing part is it comes with a very pocket friend’s price. But it lacks when it comes to durability.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>7. Voss 303 Purple Eclipse Duals Lens DOT Three Quater women Motorcycle Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is an unusual moderate style helmet which is not a full-coverage helmet but assures better safety than any half coverage helmet. It is a truly great open face helmet. If not exactly for the rider herself, it makes a great option available for passengers, that claims maximum protection and security.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key features of the Voss 303 Purple Dual Lens DOT Three Quarter are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>The weight of the Voss 303 Purple Eclipse is 2.876 Pounds.</li><li>It provides plenty of comfort to the rider for the interior can be removed fully.</li><li>Voss 303 Purple Eclipse has an integrated sun visor, which can be controlled by a single push of a button on the helmet,</li><li>It is recommendable to use lense when using sun visor.&nbsp;</li><li>It has very thick padding on the neck to keep the helmet stable even when riding at a higher speed.&nbsp;</li><li>The vents are very well placed in the helmet because it well channelizes the air and gives the ride a very comfortable ride.&nbsp;</li><li>Apart from the open chin, it also has two vents on the forehead to assure enough flow of air on the top of the rider’s head.</li><li>The helmet is available in six sizes.</li><li>There are four color options to choose from, namely Matte black, matte black eclipse, glossy white, and white.</li><li>The Eclipse version is designed with a purple halo at the jaw which looks pretty shape.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61P7SoksI9L._SX425_.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The only factor to be bothered about is, it is not very light and that is a matter of concern for the female rider because women always tend to be more affectionate about light weighing helmets.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Moreover, it lacks a chin strap. It comes with a year’s warranty, so make sure you check the other customer reviews if you decide to go for the mentioned.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>8. HJC CL-17 Streamline Women’s Full Face Motorcycle Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With a weight of around 2.89 Pounds, the HJC CL-17 is a highly favored helmet among the women motorcycle riders. It makes a great choice because of durability and lightweight. It is a very nice moisture absorbing property, to avoid discomfort due to wetness. The ventilation and padding make it very user preferred.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key features of the HJC CL-17 Streamline Women’s Helmet are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>The padding inside the helmet is very thick and comforting, which hold the riders head and assures maximum safety.</li><li>It can be a great choice for competitive riders because the visor does not come up until you push the button.</li><li>The venting system is remarkable, with twin vents on either side of the jaw and the two behind the back of the head for the outflow of air.</li><li>The most admired feature with suits it to the bold features is, it is known to offer 95% UV Protection.&nbsp;</li><li>It enables the removal of cheek pads for cleansing purposes.&nbsp;</li><li>It is available in a specific size and color only.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LTWYxZWrIWk/maxresdefault.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3f859Bf">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The budget it comes for is also appreciable. Checking down the review list we witnessed many a user demands for a modification in the vents, stating they wish if they could close the vent when drying in dry and cold days. The size restricts a lot of buys to buy the above HJC CL-17. Over the ones who fit into this, can surely give this a try.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>9. HJC FG -Flutura Female Motorcycle Helmet:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The HJC FG-Flutura is a very stylish helmet. IT has an amazing round shape with a brilliant color combined patterns on it. It is extremely light and its features make it a great deal. It can be a smart buy to be specific. The padding and venting system also does a good job.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;Key features of HJC FG-Flutura are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It is extremely light and durable and weighs approximately around 2.2Pounds.</li><li>The shell of the helmet is made up of kevlar and fiberglass matrix, which makes the helmet absolutely safe.</li><li>The material used is an advanced polymer, which used to stop bullets, so you can easily understand its safety measures.</li><li>Despite its splendid safety features, it is very light, which is very much liked by female riders.</li><li>This comes with a single visor which is like general standard helmets with a pull-up and down technique.</li><li>It has enough clearing for wearing sunglasses when riding under the sun.</li><li>The venting is also excellent, with two vents at the chin and two on the forehead.&nbsp;</li><li>The back vents are unusually at the extreme back of the head, unlike any other helmets. This is good features because the air entering from the front vents can cover with the entire head, and there prevails a healthy airflow during long rides.</li><li>It is available only in one size that is X-Large size.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://i.pinimg.com/originals/21/58/38/2158382721de28297ab1ad26feb84a69.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3dJT1pH" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The HJC FG-Flutura is a lightweight reasonably priced helmet. But the styling of the helmet and the designs gives it an expensive look. High in style and standard in values make it an amazing choice for any female motorcycle rider.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>10. YEMA YM-926 Modular Women Motorcycle&nbsp; Helmet:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Best in looks and high grades for being pocket friendly, the YEMA YM-926, is a great deal for any female motorcycle rider to grab. It a very futuristic look that tends to grab anyone’s attention. The ripped design looks absolutely tempting for anyone who has a soft corner for motorcycle and its apparels.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;Key features of the YEMA YM-926 Modular Motorcycle Helmet are as follows:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It weighs somewhere around 3.5Pounds.</li><li>It has a very quick release chin strap and it is apt for women because it does not wreck your hair when you try and open it because of its soft padding.</li><li>With a single press of a button, the sun shield becomes accessible.</li><li>Along with the integrated sun shield installation, it gives enough space for attaching Bluetooth devices.</li><li>The vents are well placed and are adjustable. This makes the helmet for all seasons and highly recommendable for touring.&nbsp;</li><li>The two vents on the forehead and the broader one in the chin can be adjusted to allow the inner flow of air.</li><li>The shell covering the helmet is not much thick which questions about its durability, but if well maintained, it can be quite durable.</li><li>The YEMA YM-926 is available in a number of choices but the color choice is restricted to only two. The color options available are white and matte black.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://sc01.alicdn.com/kf/HTB1orBHNXXXXXXqapXXq6xXFXXXd/200002196/HTB1orBHNXXXXXXqapXXq6xXFXXXd.jpg_.webp" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3gYW3Z4" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Helmet is best for touring with is flexible and adjustable vents. It comes with a warranty period of two years.&nbsp; Which is not really rider’s satisfactory as the standard regulations say, a branded DOT Certified helmet can be used minimum for a tenure of 5 years.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Conclusion:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Before knowing which is the best helmet for a female rider it is important to know, how to choose a perfect helmet. Not only a helmet one must know which <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/top-10-bikes-for-women-comparative-price-list-specifications.html">Motorcycle that suits you the best</a> and what are the necessary piece that makes a <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/women-biker-outfit-what-should-a-woman-wear-on-a-motorcycle.html">standard female biker's outfit</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Before buying a helmet, one must make sure about the safety quality it provides. Check whether it provides is full or partial coverage to the rider’s face. Check on the brand and DOT authentication. Note the visor type and other important features. Check the terms and conditions so that you can change the product in case of any defect and size fit issue. You should always buy a helmet with a perfect size. Venting also plays a very important role in making a choice for a good helmet.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is always recommendable to buy a premium helmet, maybe that cost a little much but it is a quality buy. Try to change your helmet every 5 years.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Most importantly, do not take a chance to ride out without a helmet. Safety comes first, and take this minimum safety measure of wearing a helmet whenever you set out on your motorcycle.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I hope you find this article useful and this meets the help you were seeking.</p>

					<item>
		<title>12 Best Jackets For Female Motorcycle Rider For Summer Time</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/female-motorcycle-rider-for-summer-time.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 08 Jun 2020 08:11:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=61</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When you intend to chase your dream and passion, and for you if it is only possible by riding down the roads veining through the winds, leaving back all the beauties down the road you are traveling and above all reaching your destination. This brings you the joy of win, tides of happiness.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are a female rider, the essence of happiness resides in a whole different altitude. As in earlier times, motorcycle riding was seen as a manly thing to do. But now, the women are going beyond <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">the problems faced by a lady biker</a> chasing their life goal and interest. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Not only the females are riding but also securing their names and places in the list of records in history. They are inspiring thoughts of women to struggle and achieve. Not only by what they are doing but also by the way they are doing.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/shayna-texter-the-lady-rider-who-never-gave-up.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">SHAYNA TEXTER</a>, <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/top-4-female-motorcycle-stunt-riders.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">SARAH LEZITO, CHESCA MILES, AND LEAH PETERSON</a>, the stunt riders are the epitomes of determination and dedication. They achieved everything they desired. Despite the hurdle on the way, crashes they faced, they chose not to give up.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But there are also some incidents of crashes and accidents when a rider fails to ride again after the accident or crash. So, as it is important to ride and pursue it also very vital to ride with all the safety gear which makes  <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/women-biker-outfit-what-should-a-woman-wear-on-a-motorcycle.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Perfect Outfit for Female Motorcycle Rider</a>. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Never compromise on your safety apparels while riding a motorcycle. Riding far or throttling around the corner, it is always better to wear your motorcycling gear.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Riding becomes super hectic in summers yet a rider cannot compromise on her gears and safety accessories.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/10-best-ladies-helmets-for-female-motorcycle-riders.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Motorcycling Helmet</a>, the most basic and important to equip a female rider’s outfit, the second place in the list is occupied for a female motorcycling jacket. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Wearing a jacket that is full-sleeved and fits well is an absolute must-do thing for any motorcycle rider. Motorcycling jackets help to stay protected from the elements, and from cuts and scrapes. Despite the odd seasons it is necessary to wear a jacket to ensure safety. At the same time, it is also difficult to choose a proper jacket with proper venting.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, women’s sizes and styles often require a different type of protective motorcycle jacket than men’s motorcycle jackets. For your help, we cut down great motorcycling jacket choices exclusively for a female rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Following are the best motorcycling jackets for Female Riders for riding in summertime:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1. <strong>Alpinestars Stella Andes Pro Dystar Jacket, Tech-Air Compatible:&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is the best choice for any female motorcycle rider if she chooses the textile frame over the leather frame. It is a great choice for street riding and touring purposes. The Alpinestar Stella Andes is a three-season jacket, ensuring the best protection with the integrated air-tech technology.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Stella Andes offers a completely water-proof jacket with the Drystar membrane. The Drystar membrane is well attached to abrasion-resistant, tough, and stylish outer textile. This makes the jacket highly durable.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The protection is much enhanced from the attached CE-armor in the elbows and shoulders. It is also accessible to make the Tech-Air Street Airbag&nbsp; System installed for higher protection.&nbsp; The zippers and the front cargo pockets of the jacket from Stella Andes are made waterproof. The jacket gives the rider a very stylish streamline fit.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The ventilation is absolutely fantastic and the interior of the jacket has a thick quilt liner to provide a hundred percent comfort to the rider. It comes with an inner pocket to carry quick take equips.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Alpinestar Stella Andes Pro Drystar with tech-air comes for a retail price of $550.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is highly comfortable, with great durability, and scores greats in the scale of style. The size fits perfectly and comes in 5 sizes (standard sizes) and six great colors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt="" src="https://www.phmotorcycles.co.uk/store/media/catalog/product/cache/image/700x700/e9c3970ab036de70892d86c6d221abfe/3/2/3207513107M0_0202135918.jpg"><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2A3QCHV" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to check the current price on Amazon</a></strong><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2. Indian Motorcycle Ladies Loretto jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Indian Motorcycle Ladies Loretto Jacket is one of the best choices for women for riding in summer. It has a fixed lining, with four exterior and one interior pocket. Two pockets at the chest and two on the hip.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The inner pocket is adequately spaced to stash all the personal necessities.&nbsp;Featured with an adjustable waist belt and handcuff, helps to fir the rider well and gives a great shape to the female rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is made of stretched cotton and as a rib-knit collar for all the protection and ensures rider’s comfort all the long rides in the summertime.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is designed for absolute comfort.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is designed with a leather patch in the front on the jacket and a small printed log on the back of the neck. It weighs somewhere around 3 Pounds. It is an absolutely great choice for summertime touring or city dwelling.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.hotbikeweb.com/sites/hotbikeweb.com/files/styles/655_1x_/public/images/2018/05/04-icon-mesh-af-riding-jacket.jpg?itok=Toz5-JVq" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3dKD3vg" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3.&nbsp;Icon Mesh AF Riding Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Icon Mesh AF Riding Jacket has a unique front and back mesh paneling to allow the passage of cooling air when riding on a hot summer day. The Icon mesh AF riding jacket is not heavy, while it is very light weighing, around 2.5 to 2.8 Pounds.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It excels at securing the rider’s protection, with the inclusion of an industry-leading D3O impact protector package to ensure the best safety of elbow, shoulders, and spines.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It comes with a special elbow, should, and back pads for rider’s comfort. The D3O CE certified back, shoulder and elbows armors are also removable.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The special design assures shock absorption and impact protection. Because proprietary attack fit technology it can be worn comfortably over a single layer such as a T-Shirt.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With a pricing of $180, it is available in five different colors and combinations and a wide sizing. The textile used confirms abrasion resistance.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/iconmotosports/gear/MeshAFJacketBlackFront.jpg?mtime=20180111113900"><br><strong><a href="https://www.revzilla.com/motorcycle/icon-mesh-af-ce-jacket" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the current price on Revzilla</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4. Joe Rocket Cleo 2.2 Women’s Mesh Motorcycle Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Cleo 2.2 motorcycling Jacket by Joe Rocket exhibits feminine vibe thoroughly. The shape and design of the jacket bring out the beauty of the women wearing it. It has a CE approved armor at the shoulder and elbow, which are removable. It has a removable spine pad with a pocket for optional CE spine protection.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It weighs around 4.6 Pounds. Making it quite good for females. The styling of the jacket is truly commendable. With the artistic detailed works on the right sleeve, gives the jacket a different beauty and flair.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is available in nine wide sizes ranges and three color options- black, white, or silver and red.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The jacket has a waterproof and nine-point sure fit custom adjustment system.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But the only place where it lacks is its durability and protection. If you overlook the two and use the jacket for nearby rides or riding as a passenger then it can be a good choice.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The price of the Joe Rocket Cleo 2.2 is $162. The mesh jacket is an ideal wear for summertime rides.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81S48H8x9NL._SY606_.jpg"><br><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2MBjdXy" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to check out the latest price</a></strong><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2MBjdXy" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"> on Amazon</a></strong><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5. Cortech Women’s GX Sport Air 5.0 Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This specific jacket gives the rider a sports look and makes it an ideal jacket for stunt riders and racers. The outer cover of the jacket is made of 600 denier Carbolex polyester fabric and Armor-Link 3 mesh. Extra protection in the elbows, shoulders, and forearms are enhanced with 1680 denier ballistic polyester fabric.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has neon labels and reflective panels to promote the styling along with the visibility while riding at night. The jacket is designed in a unique way to reduce arm fatigue while riding. The jacket is designed to assure the utmost flexibility, with the accordion stretch panels.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The jacket does not have a well-designed venting, and it lacks in real term protection. The jacket is not at all suitable for the hot and humid season. The shaping of this jacket is slightly off through the shoulders, and on some women, it can look a bit like a linebacker.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has four size options and the price ranges from $ 126.25 and the item weighs somewhere around 4 pounds, making it quite a great choice.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/91PErPbClML._SL1500_.jpg"><br><br><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3dKnmnQ" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to Check the Latest Price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>6. Alpinestars Vika:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The perfect jacket that gives the ultimate protection and the perfect shape of the jacket that helps you to flaunt your shape perfectly. It is an extremely comfortable piece. The ergonomic stretch zones to optimize fit is ensured by buttery soft fully grained leather combined.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The rider can freely move her body parts casually and wholly because of its great shape and fit.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is equipped with removable CE certified heat-sensitive and impact resistant shoulder and elbow protection. The material used to make the Alpine Vika is unique as it is extremely soft, thin and light in weight. A single piece of the leather collar provides a seamless creation around the neck of the rider which assures a higher level of comfort.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It weighs somewhere around 6 Pounds. Women seem to prefer safety pockets on the inner side of the jackets under the leather cover. And the Alpinestar Vika provides a completely secure space for the same.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It s a great choice for the females who don’t like to sacrifice their style statement for the sake of protection. It thoroughly claims that a tough can be stylish too.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The price of the Alpinestars Vika is $ 499 (approximately). Definitely it is a good purchase that offers durability, style, and comfort at inexpensive pricing. It is a top-class choice for meeting all the needs of a motorcycling jacket.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://static1.squarespace.com/static/56ef11c5f699bb044fd493cf/56ef4c455f21e0b2f535b15c/56ef4e135f21e0b2f535f0ed/1458523667395/vika-jacket-blk.jpg?format=original"><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/30nYxub" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to check the latest price on Amazon</a></strong><br><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>7. Spidi 4 Season H2Out Lady Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is known for its versatility. It fits all the features into a woman we all love about men’s jackets. The layered system allows the rider to enable the feature she needs for a specific time. The waterproof and insulating lines in the jacket can be removed separately and temporarily according to the season. It is ideal for a touring purpose and it excels at the venting system making it a great choice for summer rides.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The exterior shell provides abrasion resistance while CE-approved armor takes care of the elbows and shoulders. Optional chest and back protectors are available.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The size available for the Spidi 4 Season varies from XS to 3XL.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The color choices available for the same are, Black, black and grey, Fluorescent yellow with black and grey, and lastly black and grey with fuchsia. The retail price of the jacket is $550 approximately.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://smhttp-ssl-65481.nexcesscdn.net/media/catalog/product/cache/6/image/1800x/040ec09b1e35df139433887a97daa66f/4/s/4season_lady_d171_010_view_02.jpg_1.png"><br><strong><a href="https://www.revzilla.com/motorcycle/spidi-4season-h2out-womens-jacket" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the current price on Revzilla</a></strong><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>8. Milwaukee Leather, Motorcycle Jacket for Ladies:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There is nothing compared to a woman riding a cruiser with a stylish motorcycling jacket. It is essential to stay safe when you look stunning on a motorcycle. A perfect jacket to enhance the beauty and protection of the lady motorcycle rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is a great leather made motorcycle jacket for women with a great shape to make the rider absolute classy. For the outer shell of the Milwaukee Leather jacket, 1.2 MM premium milled cowhide leather is used.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The front cross over closes up to neck when cold and collar and lapels snap down in the off-single angular zipper to catch the breeze or look cool. It has a number of pockets, 2 Outside Zip Pockets plus Coin Pocket, 1 Inside Pocket, and one Snap Closure pocket for additional storage.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The torso is a bit longer than the typical which gives you freedom when riding wearing the jacket. The collar snaps down to prevent it from getting caught in the wind.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It also comes with a half belt, zip sleeves, and zip outliner.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Price of the Milwaukee Leather Jacket for female riders varies between $124.99 to $144.99approximately.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Unlike other jackets for women rider, it is available in many different sizes thus making it a great choice for many riders. The only drawback of the jacket is,&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It lacks CE shells and its accessibility to join it later, due to which the protectiveness is confined when compared to other motorcycling jackets for women. Also, it is a wonderful selection for riding a motorcycle and can be graded 2.5 out of 5 for a choice of this jacket while riding in summer.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/91nhOhLOlFL._SL1500_.jpg"><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2BHfDZH" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to check the latest price on Amazon</a></strong><br><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>9. Cortech Women’s Bella Leather jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Cortech Women’s Bella Leather Jacket is a top stylish choice to add a look of retro or cafe racer to the female rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is made of the top grained0.8 to 0.9mm thick cowhide leather. The YKK zippered front closure is antiqued too. It has two chest pockets, hand pockets, and cuff. It is designed with an antiqued hardware for a retro cafe-racer look.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The sleeves of the jacket are pre-curved and accordion stretch panels in the shoulders ensure a comfortable fit on the bike. A CE approved armor is provided in the elbow and shoulder.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A high articulated back protector is given to provide comfort to the rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It also has a very helpful accessible internal pouch pocket, and internal mobile or media storage pocket. It has a fixed liner for reduced friction and high comfort to the rider.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It comes for a quite pocket-friendly price of $ 275 and weighs nearly around, 16 Pounds.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Available in 7 sizes and two absolutely classic colors, black and vintage brown makes it an amazing choice for the female motorcycle riders.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is an excellent investment, to consider purchasing for both protection and styling. Women using the Cortech Women’s Belle Leather Jacket also reviewed that they love the round neck.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://www.revzilla.com/product_images/0266/9833/cortech_bella_jacket_750x750.jpg"><br><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3cKk96s" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to check the current price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>10. True Element Premium Braided Leather Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The True Element Premium Braided Leather truly stands out from the rest of the jackets in every respect and aspect. Durability, very pocket-friendly pricing, comforting and stylish, ticking off all the tiles, the True Element Premium Braided Leather Jacket is one of the finest jackets for female motorcycle riders.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The perfect fir size and shape it gives to riders look is commendable. It is a premium choice, made with 1 to 1.2 mm thick cowhide leather. It has a removable thermal lining which makes it fantastic to use it in all seasons.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is accessories with heavy braided zippers and hardware. It has 2 outside and one inside pocket for storage. The clinched waist takes its look to a great place. It gives the lady riders a baroness look and this is one big reason, why the female riders are a big fan of this.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is one of the inexpensive jackets compared to the premium quality. It weighs somewhere around 2.28 Pounds which very light and great for lady riders.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Price of the True Element Premium Braided Leather Jacker is $150 (approx.). It is available in seven different sizes.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81ScUhcHn6L._SL1500_.jpg"><br><br><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3h5o2GM" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click Here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>11. Joe Rocket Ladies Classic’ 92 Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has the right styling statement and comes for a very reasonable price. It is made of 1.0-1.2 MM drum dyed cowhide and is made in a very relaxed feminine manner.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Joe Rocket Classic’ 92 has a zip-in quilted liner and five well accommodated inner pockets.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The soft neoprene lining in the collar gives the rider a very comfortable feel. Pockets for optional armor at the shoulders, elbows, and back. As preferred by women, it has five interior safe, secure pockets and four pockets outside it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The color options available are black-white and brown-cream. The Joe Rocket Ladies Classic’ 92 jacket is available in 6 different sizes.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It weighs somewhere around .06 Pounds with a mediocre venting system and its price ranging from $ 270 to $ 288 approximately.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.revzilla.com/product_images/0063/5574/joe_rocket_classic92_jacket_750x750.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3h5tQzR" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>12.&nbsp;Victory Motorcycle OEM Women’s Black Skye Riding Jacket:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is a military-inspired jacket and checks on the eider’s one hundred percent safety and protection. The jacket is produced by a very authenticated company, making is absolutely brand reliable. It has a textile outer shell and bold snap detailing throughout it.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;What makes this jacket a great choice?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It weighs around 2.8 Pounds to 3.1 Pounds making it very preferable for female riders.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>He material used for making the Victory Motorcycle OEM Women’s Black Skye Riding Jacket is not only soft and flexible but also strong and durable.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The inner part has a soft nylon lining for being easy with the rider’s skin. But the jacket lacks good venting which might get this jacket at a bit dilemma for wearing in summer months.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are a few size options available for the same. The jacket looks the best when someone wears it while riding on a victory bike, for it looks amazing when the rider sits straight wearing the jacket. Leaning while riding makes it look a bit clumsy&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61Te7yzQb0L._SL1500_.jpg"><br><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2AeAi6X" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to check the current price at Amazon</a></strong><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Conclusion:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The choice of Jacket is as crucial as choosing a motorcycle and a helmet. Since female body structures vary greatly from that of men so it is very necessary to choose bikes and gears wisely. In the case of, biking accessories perfect fit plays a very crucial role. While choosing a perfect jacket for yourself it is necessary to check the following points:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Buy authenticated and branded products, </li><li>Check the size chart and then buy,</li><li>Go through the specifications carefully,</li><li>Read the warranty availability document carefully,</li><li>Make sure there is a return policy available for the product, (if buying online).</li></ul>

					<item>
		<title>8 Top Motorcycling Pants For Female Riders For Summer</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/pants-for-female-riders-for-summer.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 10 Jun 2020 08:24:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=67</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Riding a motorcycle with proper safe attire and gears is what every motorcycle rider should always look up to and also influence other fellow riders to do the same. <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Perfect Women Rider's Outfit</a> includes branded motorcycle riding helmets, motorcycling boots, motorcycling jackets, motorcycling gloves, etc.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Not only wearing these promises safety and protection to the rider but also choosing the perfect fit and best to meet your needs are what make your buy productive. So it is always preferable to know the detailed specification of the product to enhance your protection and your comfort at its best.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One of the <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/what-are-the-6-major-problems-faced-by-a-lady-biker.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">major problems of the female motorcycle rider</a> is, they have a limited amount of gears choice with restricted size options. Thus, it becomes much important for women riders to buy their biking accessories more carefully. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It becomes hectic wearing gears and proper outfit during the rides in warm months of summer.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Females prefer comfort with style bars raised high. But it essential to choose biking apparel with proper safety measures.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What are the necessary things to remember when you buy motorcycling pants for a female motorcycle rider?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Keeping the safety issue intact, a female rider cannot simply pill down a pair of jeans or trousers or leggings for a ride. Touchwood, you may be a skilled rider but one never knows when bad luck climbs down the ladder. Incidents of Motorcycle accident is more heard than any other. So, prevention is always better than cure.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Following are the feature to look for in ideal female motorcycling pants:&nbsp;</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Comfort</strong> -</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is very necessary to be comfortable in what you wear for your rides.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Size</strong> -</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The proper size of the gear you are using is a big matter to look upon.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Padding and armor:&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Select the armor and padding according to your need.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Adaptation to the Weather Condition:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Rightly one of the most important points. Choose your gear as per your riding season. To get better conform and hassle-free ride.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Return Policy:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Read the return policy thoroughly before you make your purchase so that you can return it if the size is not standard or doesn’t fit you well.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Price:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I guess no one forgets to check this unless she is too rich. It is recommendable to choose something that is affordable in quality content rather than believe that only expensive products are good.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Thus we mention some female motorcycling pants best suited to wear in summertime rides:</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>1. Maxler Jean&nbsp; Women’s Kevlar Motorcycle Jeans:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Maxler Jean Women’s Kevlar Motorycling jeans is a pair of absolutely comfortable, stylish looking pants ideal for women motorcycle riders. Well ventilated and idle for summertime rides, and has adjustable knee armors and padding to assure safety.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The material used is, blend of spandex, kevlar, and denim, for ultimate protection.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What makes it a great choice for female motorcycle riders?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Comfortable wear from flexible spandex fiber.</li><li>It has zippers in the thigh area for attaching knee protectors which also acts as vents.&nbsp;</li><li>It has kevlar fiber at the knee and hip to ensure extra protection.</li><li>The knee protectors are adjustable according to the height of the rider.</li><li>The slim fit look helps in maintaining a stylish look.</li><li>It weighs around 3.22 Pounds.</li><li>The Maxler Jean Women’s Kevlar Motorvycling jeans are available in seven different sizes and five color options.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Maxler Jean Female biker’s product is made in South Korea and produced based on the Korean boy’s height. So make sure you check through the size chart properly before making an order. Also recommendable to read the return policy sincerely for alteration case of size fir issue. The price of the pants is also reasonable.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51crce8f7lL._SX425_.jpg" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>2. Summer Mesh Motorcycle Riding Jeans:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Summer in its name, the pants are ideal for rides during the warm month, which absolutely comfortable and slim fit to enhance your sleek structure. It is the absolute best venting system to give the rider maximum cooling while riding in the warm humid days.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The material used is Spandex, cotton, and 14oz stretch denim.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What makes it a great choice for female motorcycle riders?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>The materials used in its making makes the pants very durable and comfortable.</li><li>It has two pads in the knee area and two on the hips that give comfort ride to the female riders.</li><li>The sleek, skin fit design gives the rider wearing it a very great look.&nbsp;</li><li>It has two knees X2 and a hip X2 advanced sponge protection module.</li><li>The integrated back and back waist folding technology give them more flexibility and discomfort.&nbsp;</li><li>It is ideal for using in street biking, touring, ATV, UTV, etc.</li><li>It has a very good venting system that helps is air circulation.</li><li>It weighs around 2.58 Pounds.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The summer mesh motorcycle pants for females is an elite choice for it serves many purposes, of high-quality, durability, great shape, and affordable size.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
