<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>3. Dainese New Drake Air Textile Pants:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you want a perfect slim fit, fashionable pants for your riding days Dainese New Drake Air Textile Pants can be a great choice. It is made of full 750D textile. It provides multi industry-leading multi-season riding.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is made up of, suretta fabric.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What makes it a great choice for female motorcycle riders?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It has elastic integrated inserts, with CE rated extension.</li><li>It has wide flip-up vets to maximize the flow of air. It is strategically positioned to flexibly open and close the vents as per the season.</li><li>It has perforated fabric and inserted in elastic fabric to make the pants stretchable.</li><li>The soft hip pads and knee armors and pads are irreplaceable and well sewn to ensure a hundred percent comfort to the rider.</li><li>It has a lining system to join and fasten the jacket to the pants.</li><li>It has an adjustable waist to rightly fit the rider.</li><li>It is available in a wide range of sizes.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It can a great choice and assuring all the needs, right from protection, comfort, breathability.&nbsp;The premium buy comes for a premium price.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><img alt="" src="https://motocard.s3.amazonaws.com/products/images/04828/new_drake_air_tex_n-1-M-0482841-large.jpg"><br><strong><a href="https://www.revzilla.com/motorcycle/dainese-new-drake-air-textile-pants" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to check the current price on Revzilla</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>4. Scorpion Exo Drafter II Mesh Pants:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The well ventilated broad pants are great for summer wear. These pants are lightweight along with well armored and lightly yet protectively padded. It has Airguard windproof technology to close when the temperature lowers, while in the summertime it can let in ample air.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Materials used, It is made up of, long-lasting poly-mesh with 600 denier nylon at the knees and seat area to enhance its durability.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Why is Scorpion Exo Drafter II Mesh Pants a great choice for summertime rides for female riders</strong>:</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>It has poly-tech perforated polyester for maximum airflow.</li><li>It has CE approved ventilated armor on the knees.</li><li>Dual-adjustment waist belts for additional support and better fit.</li><li>Stretch panel of upper knees for flexibility and comfort.</li><li>For better visibility at night time, it has neon night viz reflective edge design.</li><li>It has a belt loop for adjustment of the jacket.</li><li>Inner pockets for removable hip armor.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is a fully vetted jacket with a warranty of one year, which helps to trust the brand more.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The durability of the pant is also praiseworthy. The moderately priced pant pair can be a great choice.&nbsp;</p>

<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is a great choice for summer because it has Jet ventilation system for comfort and ease ride. The pants look very funky and cool and give a sporty look to the rider, which makes it many favorites to many female riders. It is available in seven sizes and two color options.</p>

CE level to armors at knees.&nbsp;</li></ul>

<h2><strong>Conclusion:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Safety gears are a crucial and very basic part of motorcycle riding. So, when choosing motorcycling pants, make sure to compliment the pants with your jackets because the pants have an adjustment criterion with the jackets. So for a better fit and best resource utilization read about the jackets and make a buy.</p>

					<item>
		<title>Top 8 Summer Motorcycle Gloves</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/summer-motorcycle-gloves.html</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 12 Jun 2020 08:30:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=72</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Before we start to choose the best gloves to wear for our tours and regular city rides in a motorcycle, it is important to know,</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Why do bikers wear gloves?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The glove is one of the important parts of a <a href="https://motorcyclehype.com/women-biker-outfit-what-should-a-woman-wear-on-a-motorcycle.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Biker's Outfit</a> to ensure full safety to the motorcycle riders. It helps in keeping your hands dry by absorbing sweat. It enhances the rider’s better grip on the handlebar. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Gloves help you to have a better comfortable ride when riding in the chilly cold days, at the same time right selection of glove with proper venting helps in a good summer ride, preventing sweating of hands.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Never compromise on your safety apparels while riding a motorcycle. Riding far or throttling around the corner, it is always better to wear your motorcycling gear.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Riding becomes super hectic in summers yet a rider cannot compromise on her gears and safety accessories. Just like Helmets, Jackets, Pants, Boots, gloves is an important gear. But the choice of the gloves should be made very carefully, as every manufacturer has different size ratios, so whenever buying gloves make sure to crawl down the size chart very carefully and also read the return policy essentially.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What are the best summer motorcycle gloves?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After some researches, we are here to help you choose the best for your ride, here we list down the 8 best motorcycling gloves for summer rides:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>1. Alpinestars Men's SMX-1 Air V2 Motorcycle Riding Glove:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Buying a product from such a brand which is known for its authenticity in all the motorcycling gears. Be it, helmets, jackets, pants, or gloves Alpinestar continues to provide products to the motorcycle riders which are great quality-wise, comfortable for the riders, durable and reasonable pricing.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What are the features of Alpinestars Men's SMX-1 Air V2 Motorcycle Riding Glove?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Premium leather and mesh is used to make these fine pair of gloves. Strategic construction with proper perforation and mesh for higher breathability makes it a wonderful piece and a great choice for summer rides.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For abrasion resistance and better impact on grips over the handlebars, the glove has a specialized knuckle protection system.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has Synthetic suede zones and side padding reinforcement for durability and high comfort. This also helps in enhancing resisting abrasion.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has a loop closure system to tighten the gloves as per the rider’s requirement. It comes with stretch zones on the fingers and backhand for comfort. It helps in flexibility and better hand movement during the ride.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Alpinestars Men's SMX-1 Air V2 Motorcycle Riding Glove has a very stylish look, it gives a sporty look. &nbsp;It is available in four color choices and combinations.&nbsp; It would look the best when worn with the Alpinestars Stella Andes Pro Drystar Jacket.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is available in six varying sizes. This exclusive choice can be a great choice for the female riders too as it ensures all the protection and comfort with the added essence of style statement.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://www.amazon.com/Alpinestars-SMX-2-Street-Motorcycle-Gloves/dp/B01N7JUAM9/ref=as_li_ss_il?dchild=1&amp;keywords=alpinestars+men's+smx-1+air+v2+motorcycle+riding+gloves&amp;qid=1591983627&amp;sr=8-1&amp;linkCode=li3&amp;tag=doodleish-20&amp;linkId=f211fd08630150f3304730da0dd3c3bd&amp;language=en_US" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><img src="//ws-na.amazon-adsystem.com/widgets/q?_encoding=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B01N7JUAM9&amp;Format=_SL250_&amp;ID=AsinImage&amp;MarketPlace=US&amp;ServiceVersion=20070822&amp;WS=1&amp;tag=doodleish-20&amp;language=en_US" alt="Alpinestars Men's 1 Air v2 gloves"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://ir-na.amazon-adsystem.com/e/ir?t=doodleish-20&amp;language=en_US&amp;l=li3&amp;o=1&amp;a=B01N7JUAM9" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/2XWwOzi" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here, to check the latest price on Amazon</a></strong><br><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2. Joe Rocket Men’s Eclipse Gloves:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ideal for Street-sport-motorcycles, Street touring motorcycles, Street cruiser motorcycles, All-terrain vehicles, joe Rocket Eclipse Gloves is a premium choice for motorcycle riders irrespective of gender.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What is the feature that makes Joe Rocket Eclipse Gloves a premium choice?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Made of Utility grade span or poly chassis with great ventilation, that enables high breathability has enhanced its choice over any other gloves by all users.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One more iconic feature about the specific glove is it has a conductive material at the top of the index finger for touch screen accessibility.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To check on the flexibility, it has TPR reinforced knuckle system. It helps in the comfortable movement of fingers and thus better grip over the handlebars.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has a high technological upgraded and user-friendly pre-curved design.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It ensures high comfort to the rider, with its leather fixed palm. It put the bars high on durability and its integrated venting system and makes it ideal for summer usage.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is available in two colors black and black and brown combined. The gloves are available in six sizes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81MR7I39rJL._SY606_.jpg" alt="Joe Rocket Eclipse Gloves"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://amzn.to/3hlhZhl" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Click here to know the latest price on Amazon</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>3. Dainese Desert Poon D1 Unisex Gloves:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With a great stylish look, and high protection coverage Dainese Desert Poon D1 Unisex gloves are great for any rides in any weather. The semi-heavy yet vented glove is absolutely suitable for winter as well as summertime rides.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What are the features of Dainese Desert Poon D1 Unisex Gloves?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Made of synthetic leather suede palm for comfort, which also makes it highly durable.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has a highly integrated smart touch technology attached for making it user friendly and you need not always remove your glove when using your touch screen device in-between rides for halts.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has a reflective logo, which gives a very cool look.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The breathable and stretchable fabric makes it comfortable in summer and flexible respectively.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The neoprene cuff is adjustable and helps in the proper fitting of the piece.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is available in a wide range of sizes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://dainese-cdn.thron.com/delivery/public/image/dainese/803bf890-bc26-4d30-952d-81553e3aab3a/ramfdh/std/1200x1200/desert-poon-d1-unisex.jpg" alt="Dainese Desert Poon D1 Gloves"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>4. Spidi Flash R Evo Gloves:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Nothing can be a better choice for buying gloves which a single pair assures, safety protection, durability, proper ventilation, flexibility, and style orders. It’s strategically positioned padding and technology-based design makes is one of the best gloves available for motorcycle riders.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What makes the Spidi Flash R Evo Gloves a great selection?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is made of a combination of materials of mesh fabric, stretch fabric, leather, and neoprene with incorporated polyurethane protection in the area of the knuckles of a variable density for secure protection and comfort.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With accordion inserts on the finger and palm of very resistant microfiber element.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Reinforcements panels on the palm and sides of the palm to protection.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Silicon Insertion in the palm, for supreme grip, and index finger with advanced touch-sensitive material. And the strap on the wrist is made of velcro.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The glove is available in two colors and a wide range of size options.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://smhttp-ssl-65481.nexcesscdn.net/media/catalog/product/cache/2/image/1800x/040ec09b1e35df139433887a97daa66f/b/7/b79-011-1.png" alt="Spidi Flash R Evo Gloves"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Tire Pressure Recommendation for Harley Davidson</title>
		<link>https://motorcyclehype.com/tire-pressure-recommendation-for-harley-davidson.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 14 Jun 2020 08:35:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[doodleish]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://motorcyclehype.com/?p=75</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The tire pressure of every motorcycle depends on the temperature in which the rider is riding the bike.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The pressure of the motorcycle tire tends to increase if the rider is riding on a hot-tempered road.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So, the pressure recommendation for every motorcycle defers from temperature to temperature.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Though the recommended average tire pressure of Harley Davidson motorcycle in the cold condition is 36 psi in the front tire and 40 psi in the rear tire. These may change for hot climate and may vary to 32 psi for the front tire and 36 psi for the rear tire.&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What PSI should my motorcycle tires be at?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It really depends on which Harley Davidson motorcycle you ride.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To find the exact tire pressure for your motorcycle model just look out for the sticker on the shocker, there the exact pressure for your model would be mentioned.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Be aware of it because the psi pressure recommended over there would be for a specific temperature. The temperature mentioned over there would be recommended for either cold or hot conditions.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If the recommended tire pressure is for the cold condition and if the current condition is hot around you, then try to inflate your tire 4 PSI less than the recommended tire pressure for your Harley Davidson.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For example, if it is recommended, 36 psi for the front tire, and 40 psi for the rear tire for your Harley Davidson in cold condition, then you must inflate the tire up to 32 psi for the front tire and 36 psi for the rear tire of your Harley Davidson motorcycle.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>And the case for the hot climate the things would be just reversed, if the mentioned tire pressure is for hot condition and the climate around you is cold, then try to inflate your tire with extra 4 psi of tire pressure.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For example if the tire pressure for your Harley Davidson model is recommended to be 32 PSI for the front tire and 36 psi for the rear tire and the current condition of the tire is cold, then you can inflate the tire up to 36 psi tire pressure for the front tire and 40 psi tire pressure for the rear tire.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Why does the tire pressure differ with temperature?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is a basic science as stated by the law of equilibrium that the pressure is directly proportional to the temperature.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>which means that if the temperature rises up the pressure also increases.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Why do we have to inflate less the recommended Tire pressure for a hot condition?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As you read that the pressure changes with the temperature. So, whenever the temperature rises up the pressure also rises up. So in case if the tire pressure in your tire is at 36 PSI for your Harley Davidson model and suddenly the temperature rises up, then that 36 psi of your tire pressure may increase up to 40 psi.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What to do if the climate temperature near you varies a lot.</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Lower tire pressures can be dangerous as compared to higher tire pressures.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If your tires already have low pressures as suddenly the temperature increases, the pressure may again fall and the tire may deflate, and as a tire deflates most of the tire surface touches the ground which may increase the danger of a blowout of the tires.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>that is why higher tire pressure is generally less dangerous than keeping the tires in low pressures as long as you are under the maximum inflation pressure.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>How many PSI is overinflated?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In normal cases, over-inflation is considered when the tire pressure is more 6 PSI than the recommended tire pressure for the Harley Davidson.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What is a dangerous PSI level?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If the current tire pressure more than 7-8 PSI from the recommended tire pressure for the Harley Davidson model then that PSI level is considered to be a dangerous tire pressure PSI level.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>At what PSI will a tire explode?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It really depends on the tire that the Harley-Davidson model is using the current temperature and the inflation level.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>chances of a tire to exclude me increase if there is a drastic change in the heat condition and if your Harley Davidson motorcycle tires are over the dangerous PSI level.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you still feel don't feel confident about tire pressure feel free to contact the Harley-Davidson dealer near you. They will just recommend the perfect tire pressure for your Harley Davidson motorcycle model and that would be the best and recommended way to know your recommended tire pressure for Harley Davidson model through an authentic source.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The information provided in this article are average values generated based on various reviews and researches.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The values for the pressure of tires may vary with the quality tire, temperature around you, and many more factors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Please consult an expert in case of any confusion.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We won't be responsible for any of your losses due to any of your mistakes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
